item.title: On the Nashville Shooting [The Other Club]
item.description:
The Other Club with Mike and Tim ~ March 29, 2023

On this episode of The Other Club, hosts Dr. Michael Thiessen and Tim Tysoe unpack the tragic premeditated murder of three children and three adults at The Covenant School in Nashville. 

Episode Resources: https://news.sky.com/story/nashville-school-shooting-what-we-know-about-the-killer-so-far-12843858;
https://nypost.com/2023/03/28/nashville-school-shooters-chilling-final-messages-to-pal-revealed;
https://www.louderwithcrowder.com/nashville-target-school-security;
https://twitter.com/simonateba/status/1640415175215038467;
https://twitchy.com/brettt-3136/2023/03/27/abcs-terry-moran-links-shooting-to-tennessees-law-banning-medical-care-for-trans-minors;
https://www.transradicalactivistnetwork.org/transdayof-vengeance;
https://www.dailywire.com/news/trans-activists-called-for-day-of-vengeance-before-nashville-shooting;
https://twitter.com/JackPosobiec/status/1640702372639809543/photo/1;
Body Cam footage of the kill: https://twitter.com/disclosetv/status/1640722557111357441

item.title: How to Battle Institutional Entropy [The Other Club]
item.description:
The Other Club with Mike and Tim ~ March 22, 2023

The forces of decay seem to have overwhelmed all of our institutions. From education to politics, and even recreation, it is no longer safe to vote for your local "conservative" or turn on a hockey game. Tune in to this week's episode to learn how to battle institutional entropy from hosts Dr. Michael Thiessen and Tim Tysoe. Enjoy!

Episode Resources: GERRIT VAN DORLAND: DISQUALIFIED BY CPC FOR BEING PRO-LIFE | Campaign Life Coalition: https://www.campaignlifecoalition.com/clc-blog/id/258/title/gerrit-van-dorland-disqualified-by-cpc-for-being-pro-life; Conservatives disqualify pro-life Oxford by-election nomination candidate | True North: https://tnc.news/2023/03/15/conservatives-disqualify-pro-life-candidate2/.
